content:
# The error indicates that I attempted to place the Stone Furnace without specifying a direction, which is required for entity placement.

# To resolve this, I need to specify a direction when placing the new Stone Furnace. 

# I will choose a direction (e.g., UP, DOWN, LEFT, or RIGHT) to position the new furnace relative to the current coordinates.

# Given the current position of the original furnace, I will place the new Stone Furnace to the RIGHT of it.

# Let's correct that and place the new Stone Furnace properly.

# I will place the new Stone Furnace to the RIGHT of the existing one.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-10, 5), Direction.RIGHT)  # Place the new stone furnace to the right.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-10, 5)), quantity=5)  # Insert Copper Ore into the newly placed furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-10, 5)), quantity=5)  # Insert Coal as a fuel resource allowing productive outputs.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting items into the new furnace.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
